dmca.title: Requesting immediate termination of illegal activity on the Everyone's Internet servi
dmca.body:
________________________________

From: NCsoft IP Rights [mailto:iprights@ncsoft.com] 
Posted At: Wednesday, November 22, 2006 2:44 PM
Posted To: DMCA
Conversation: Requesting immediate termination of illegal activity on
the Everyone's Internet service
Subject: Requesting immediate termination of illegal activity on the
Everyone's Internet service



Hello,

Please review the attached PDF file concerning illegal activity on the
Everyone's Internet service. If there are any questions or concerns, or
if I may be of any assistance in the matter, please let me know.

Your prompt attention to this matter is most appreciated.

Thank you for your time,

Mitchell Burton

NCsoft North America

<<Cease and Desist (www.lineage2endeavor.com).pdf>>
